metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5816 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer overflow error within the "identify()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) in LibRaw versions prior to 0.18.12 can be exploited to trigger a division by zero via specially crafted NOKIARAW file (Note: This vulnerability is caused due to an incomplete fix of CVE-2018-5804).

notes.Note: amurray> Issue caused by an incomplete fix for CVE-2018-5804

criterions.comment: darktable package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
rawtherapee package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
